text: Koraa, ‘te'om tomalokara oparara paraa ba talara paraa sasti pathabalai, na'iba tomalokaka bibhinna sandehapurna dalata bibhakta karaibalai athaba eta dalaka ana eta dalara sangharsara soraada grahana karaabalai purna saksama’. Coraa, ami kenekai bibhinna dharane ayatasamuha bibrta karao yate sihamte bhalakai bujiba parae
